comments.body: Maybe worth pointing out the adhoc machines (perhaps with a link to the relevant section in the release instructions for how you can access them)?
Good point, I've added a link.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +154,158 @@wish to update packages, then you need to change the `packages` and
`local_snapshot` attributes accordingly and afterwards execute the following
command on Unix and Windows to update the lock-files:
```
bazel run @stackage-unpinned//:pin
